{"blocks":[{"key":"df2lj","text":"Pool the supernatant fractions, filter through a 0.45 µm syringe filter, concentrate with 10 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore), and load onto a pre-equilibrated Superdex 200 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva). Elute the proteins with SEC buffer. Analyze the fractions by SDS-PAGE and Coomassie staining. Pools fractions containing purified NIX-GFP.
